item.title: Understanding Health Insurance: What Coverage Do You Really Need?
item.description: Health insurance is one of the most important types of insurance coverage you can have. It helps cover the costs of medical expenses, from routine check-ups to unexpected emergencies. But with so many different types of health insurance plans available, how do you know which one is right for you? In this article, weâ€™ll break down the basics of health insurance and guide you on what coverage you really need.
